name: Mountago
overview:
Mountago provides technology to help people search for and share their previous experiences in the mountains. The aim of Mountago is simple, to help people find what they are looking for when planning a trip to the mountains - connecting people with pistes.

For people, Mountago is a practical tool that can help them effectively plan their time in the mountains. It gives users a straightforward way to find exactly what they need, be that a hotel, chalet, restaurant, instructor, shop. The results can be shown on a resorts map (with lifts and pistes where available) or on a board.

For businesses, Mountago is an advanced tool based on the latest technology, providing them with a simple and efficient way to connect with their customers. Mountago makes it easy for businesses to present their offerings to people who are looking for them. Having a profile on Mountago is free and always will be.
